title: JSON schema of Apify Actor dataset schema

actorSpecification.description: Specifies the version of the dataset schema structure document. Only version 1 is currently supported.
actorSpecification.x-intellij-html-description: Specifies the version of the dataset schema structure document. Only version 1 is currently supported.
actorSpecification.markdownDescription: Specifies the version of the dataset schema structure document. Only version 1 is currently supported.

title.description: The title of the Actor dataset schema.
title.x-intellij-html-description: The title of the Actor dataset schema.
title.markdownDescription: The title of the Actor dataset schema.

description.description: The description of the Actor dataset schema.
description.x-intellij-html-description: The description of the Actor dataset schema.
description.markdownDescription: The description of the Actor dataset schema.

fields.description: A JSON schema compatible object that defines the schema for a single dataset object. It uses JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 or other compatible formats.
fields.x-intellij-html-description: A JSON schema compatible object that defines the schema for a single dataset object. It uses JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 or other compatible formats.
fields.markdownDescription:
A JSON schema compatible object that defines the schema for a single dataset object. It uses JSON Schema Draft
2020-12 or other compatible formats.

title.description: The title of the view, which is visible in the UI's Output tab and in the API.
title.x-intellij-html-description: The title of the view, which is visible in the UI's Output tab and in the API.
title.markdownDescription: The title of the view, which is visible in the UI's Output tab and in the API.

description.description: The description of the view, which is only available in the API response.
description.x-intellij-html-description: The description of the view, which is only available in the API response.
description.markdownDescription: The description of the view, which is only available in the API response.

fields.description: An array of strings that selects the fields to be presented in the output. The order of the fields determines the order of the columns in the UI visualization.
fields.x-intellij-html-description: An array of strings that selects the fields to be presented in the output. The order of the fields determines the order of the columns in the UI visualization.
fields.markdownDescription:
An array of strings that selects the fields to be presented in the output. The order of the fields determines
the order of the columns in the UI visualization.

clean.description: A boolean flag. When true, it removes fields from the output that are not specified in the fields array.
clean.x-intellij-html-description: A boolean flag. When true, it removes fields from the output that are not specified in the fields array.
clean.markdownDescription: A boolean flag. When true, it removes fields from the output that are not specified in the `fields` array.

omit.description: An array of strings that specifies fields to be removed from the output. Nested field names can also be used.
omit.x-intellij-html-description: An array of strings that specifies fields to be removed from the output. Nested field names can also be used.
omit.markdownDescription: An array of strings that specifies fields to be removed from the output. Nested field names can also be used.

unwind.description: An array of strings that specifies fields to deconstruct nested children into a parent object, effectively flattening the structure.
unwind.x-intellij-html-description: An array of strings that specifies fields to deconstruct nested children into a parent object, effectively flattening the structure.
unwind.markdownDescription:
An array of strings that specifies fields to deconstruct nested children into a parent object, effectively
flattening the structure.

flatten.description: An array of strings that specifies nested objects to transform into a flat structure.
flatten.x-intellij-html-description: An array of strings that specifies nested objects to transform into a flat structure.
flatten.markdownDescription: An array of strings that specifies nested objects to transform into a flat structure.

desc.description: A boolean flag. If true, results are sorted in descending order based on the time they were written to the dataset (newest first). By default, they are sorted in ascending order.
desc.x-intellij-html-description: A boolean flag. If true, results are sorted in descending order based on the time they were written to the dataset (newest first). By default, they are sorted in ascending order.
desc.markdownDescription:
A boolean flag. If `true`, results are sorted in descending order based on the time they were written to the
dataset (newest first). By default, they are sorted in ascending order.

skipHidden.description: A boolean flag. If true, fields marked as hidden in the original schema are skipped.
skipHidden.x-intellij-html-description: A boolean flag. If true, fields marked as hidden in the original schema are skipped.
skipHidden.markdownDescription: A boolean flag. If `true`, fields marked as hidden in the original schema are skipped.

skipEmpty.description: A boolean flag. If true, empty fields are skipped.
skipEmpty.x-intellij-html-description: A boolean flag. If true, empty fields are skipped.
skipEmpty.markdownDescription: A boolean flag. If `true`, empty fields are skipped.

transformation.description: The definition of data transformation applied when dataset data is loaded from the Dataset API.
transformation.x-intellij-html-description: The definition of data transformation applied when dataset data is loaded from the Dataset API.
transformation.markdownDescription: The definition of data transformation applied when dataset data is loaded from the Dataset API.

component.description: A string that specifies the type of UI component to use for displaying the data. The only valid value is "table" or "grid".
component.x-intellij-html-description: A string that specifies the type of UI component to use for displaying the data. The only valid value is "table" or "grid".
component.markdownDescription:
A string that specifies the type of UI component to use for displaying the data. The only valid value is "table"
or "grid".

options.description: An object for passing additional options to the display component. The specific properties depend on the component used.
options.x-intellij-html-description: An object for passing additional options to the display component. The specific properties depend on the component used.
options.markdownDescription:
An object for passing additional options to the display component. The specific properties depend on the
`component` used.

properties.description: An object where keys match the transformation.fields and values are ViewDisplayProperty objects. It is used to customize the display of specific columns, such as their label or format.
properties.x-intellij-html-description: An object where keys match the transformation.fields and values are ViewDisplayProperty objects. It is used to customize the display of specific columns, such as their label or format.
properties.markdownDescription:
An object where keys match the `transformation.fields` and values are `ViewDisplayProperty` objects. It is used
to customize the display of specific columns, such as their label or format.

display.description: The definition for the visual presentation of the data in the Output tab UI.
display.x-intellij-html-description: The definition for the visual presentation of the data in the Output tab UI.
display.markdownDescription: The definition for the visual presentation of the data in the Output tab UI.

views.description: An object containing descriptions of API and UI views for the dataset.
views.x-intellij-html-description: An object containing descriptions of API and UI views for the dataset.
views.markdownDescription: An object containing descriptions of API and UI views for the dataset.
